title: Scripting with Quarkus
summary: This guide explores how to script with Quarkus using JBang, allowing developers to build REST applications using just a single Java file without the need for Maven or Gradle. It covers setting up a Quarkus project, adding dependencies, and creating a service with REST endpoints. Dependency injection and native compilation with JBang are also discussed. The guide is ideal for quickly getting started with Quarkus in a scripting environment.
